TopicTitle: Using Kerbal Engineer redux with KMP

Articles.Content: hey everyone. I was playing 40+ hours of ksp in the summer of last year and came to rely on kerbal engineer for all the sweet numbers!! Recently started getting back into ksp and love the kmp mod. obviously I can't use k3rbal engineer with the mod so my question is, is there any other mods that do the same type of thing that are compatible with kmp? thanks in advance for any replies.
